description: Try our easy to follow Beef & Vegetable Hot Pot recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beef & Vegetable Hot Pot Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using chopsticks, add pieces of meat and vegetables to stock. Cook for 2 minutes, then using a small ladle transfer to serving bowl. Garnish with spring onion and serve with stock, rice and soy or chilli sauce.
